ModMetaData.name: LMC010.负载均衡
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Multiple people can deliver resources to a blueprint. 允许多个人能同时向一个建造蓝图提供原材料。 Share The Load tracks what is needed and doesn't deliver too much. 共享搬运负载以避免单个人漫长的搬运耗时。 Multiple people also clear things out of the way for construction as well. 允许多个人同时也能清除建造工地的杂物。 An option to deliver even when there's not enough to finish the building. 允许即使建筑材料不够的情况下仍然向工地提供原材料。 Check Steam page for any updated info.
